EmailTemplate.description: AOG Sterling Will Call Job Needed
EmailTemplate.name: AOG Sterling Will Call Job Needed
EmailTemplate.subject: **WILL CALL JOB # NEEDED** HONEYWELL AOG
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Sterling,
We are working an AOG order for {!Case.Account} and they have asked us to also arrange transport via Sterling using their account number, ####.
Pickup location will be Honeywell Address: XXXX
Please advise Will Call Job number. We will provide additional details after we have completed processing the order.
Thank you,
Honeywell AOG Customer Support Team http://www.MyAerospace.com
NOTE: International shipment responsibilities such as import clearance, duties, fees or taxes (if applicable), and/or any other country specific requirements are the sole responsibility of the customer/receiving party.
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
